title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 121.4 - Hearing offices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 121.4 - Hearing offices

State Regulations

The commissioner shall establish one or more offices in
each jurisdiction in which the program is established. These offices will be
staffed with administrative law judges, supervisors and clerical personnel
adequate to carry out the provisions of article 2-A of the Vehicle and Traffic

Law. The locations and hours of operation of each office will be established by
the commissioner. Such information shall be indicated on any summons issued. A
change in hours and/or location will not affect the validity of any
summonses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
121.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
